message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is a unique opportunity that we believe is worth $1200000 to you. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1100000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let us know if you are interested.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $1100000. I am willing to pay up to $950000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we would like to maintain the integrity of our product's value. We are unable to accept your offer of $950000. However, we are willing to negotiate further. Would you be interested in discussing a revised offer closer to our original price of $1100000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still unable to meet the original asking price. However, I am willing to pay $1000000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with your valuation.
